item.title: Open Unity 5 Project With Right Click
item.description: Are you tired of having to open Unity3D to open your Unity3D project or sometimes you have to open Unity3D and press Open and search for your Unity3D project. Well no more, I found this awesome trick that would make opening Unity3D project way for more easier on both Windows and OS X. First off, On Windows this is from Adam Tuliper an Developer Evangelist for Microsoft blog. It’s just registry file.

item.title: About
item.description: Work Experience At Mediaload PTE. LTD React Native Developer 2018 Feburary to Present Building iOS and Android for Little Fashion L192. At Pathmazing Node.js Backend Developer 2017 August to November Building Service Endpoint For Pathmazing. At Morakot Technology Web Developer 2016 to 2017 Python Web Developer In Core-banking System. Education Bachelor Degree in Computer Science Royal University of Phnom Penh (RUPP) 2012 to 2016 Graduated Bachelor Degree in major Computer Science.

item.title: Bookshelf
item.description: All the books that I’ve read and owned. .gr_grid_container { } .gr_grid_book_container { float: left; width: 98px; height: 160px; padding: 0px 0px; overflow: hidden; } Share book reviews and ratings with Mengkheang, and even join a book club on Goodreads.

item.title: Projects
item.description: fetch('https://api.github.com/repos/mengkheang\/esmysqlsync') .then(function(response) { return response.json(); }) .then(function(res) { var section = document.getElementsByTagName("SECTION")[1]; var wrapper = document.createElement("DIV"); wrapper.id = res.id var name = document.createElement("H1"); var language = document.createElement("CODE"); var description = document.createElement("P"); var link = document.createElement("A"); var titleWrapper = document.createElement("DIV"); titleWrapper.style['display'] = 'flex'; titleWrapper.style['align-items'] = 'center'; titleWrapper.appendChild(name) titleWrapper.appendChild(language) language.style['margin-left'] = '10px'; link.href = res.html_url; link.innerHTML = res.name name.style.display = 'inline'; name.style['height'] = '50px'; name.appendChild(link) language.innerHTML = res.language; description.innerHTML = res.description; wrapper.
